column4: I recently installed 4GB of RAM on my system. I am on Ubuntu 8.10 64 bit but It can only see up to 3.2 GB of RAM (my mobo supports up to 16 GB of RAM)
I recently installed 4GB of RAM on my system. I am on Ubuntu 8.10 64 bit but It can only see up to 3.2 GB of RAM (my mobo supports up to 16 GB of RAM)
check the bios for any option about >4GB mem remapping
also make sure you installed 64bit ubuntu
